/usr/bin/cc   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/example02.dir/example02-goption-interface.o  -o ../.build/bin/example02  -L/home/ldf/workspace/mygstreamer/GStreamer-example/.build/lib -Wl,-rpath,/home/ldf/workspace/mygstreamer/GStreamer-example/.build/lib -lpthread -lgstreamer-1.0 -lgobject-2.0 -lglib-2.0 -ldirectfb
